blocks.content: EXPERIENCE
lines: ## EXPERIENCE

blocks.content: Author and historian of global political economy, with a strong focus on archival research. After monitoring sector risks for the Higher Education Integrity Unit, I wrote sci-fi scripts for video games. Currently working to publish my PhD research as a book that links to an open-source digital archive.
lines: Author and historian of global political economy, with a strong focus on archival research. After monitoring sector risks for the Higher Education Integrity Unit, I wrote sci-fi scripts for video games. Currently working to publish my PhD research as a book that links to an open-source digital archive.

blocks.content: THE ABC’S HEYWIRE COMPETITION / 2009
lines: THE ABC’S HEYWIRE COMPETITION / 2009

blocks.content: A storytelling competition designed to give voice to young rural Australians. Winners are interviewed on ABC radio, and participate in a leadership conference in Canberra. There, they work with ABC journalists, bureaucrats and politicians to develop ideas aimed at improving the lives of young people in regional Australia. The ideas are presented at Parliament House in front of an esteemed panel.
lines: A storytelling competition designed to give voice to young rural Australians. Winners are interviewed on ABC radio, and participate in a leadership conference in Canberra. There, they work with ABC journalists, bureaucrats and politicians to develop ideas aimed at improving the lives of young people in regional Australia. The ideas are presented at Parliament House in front of an esteemed panel.
